egg_shakes.speaker: Narrator
egg_shakes.text: The egg is moving! Cracks appear across its surface as something inside struggles to break free.

first_crack.speaker: Narrator
first_crack.text: CRACK! A piece of shell falls away, revealing a tiny snout. Large, curious eyes blink open for the first time.

hatching.speaker: Baby Dragon
hatching.text: *Chirp!* The little dragon tumbles out of its shell, looking up at you with wonder. Its scales shimmer in the light.

first_look.speaker: Narrator
first_look.text: The dragon stumbles toward you on wobbly legs. It's no bigger than a cat, with oversized eyes and tiny wing-buds.

name_prompt.speaker: Narrator
name_prompt.text: The dragon chirps expectantly. What will you call this little one?

after_naming.speaker: Narrator
after_naming.text: The dragon seems to understand. It chirps happily and nuzzles against your hand. A lifelong bond has formed.

mother_note.speaker: Mother
mother_note.text: (In your mind, you hear your mother's voice) 'The food you cook shapes the dragon's color and abilities. Treat it well, and it will help your cafe flourish.'
